item.title: Layers of Tone
item.author: Adam Khamis,
item.description: A revival of what once was A simple concept of black and white. One that was with no out, now barely suckled by fading shadows. The intention, to replicate fame Leads, To this insane journey Of delayed steps and off beats. And looking down upon this pool That has yet to be made. A reflection of â€¦
